## The Data-Driven Renewables Research Group

The Data-Driven Renewables Research (D2R2 - Disney, please don't sue) Group led by Dr. Peter Schindler is seeking to
discover novel materials for renewable energy applications using high-throughput quantum chemistry calculations
and data-driven materials property predictions.

> Currently, we have an **opening for a Postdoctoral Research Associate** in our group, starting in *Spring 2024*.
> Details can be found [here](/content/join.html).
